question.body: Which salivary gland is located between the skin and the masseter muscle near the ears?

response.feedback: Correct. The parotid glands are located near the ears.
Incorrect. The submandibular glands are in the floor of the mouth.
Incorrect. The sublingual glands are located below the tongue.
Incorrect. The buccal glands are in the cheeks and are not one of the major saliva producing glands.
